hackathon-description-text: On December 2nd 2017, we are hosting MLH Local Hack Day at Shopify's Toronto Office. What better place to flex your innovation skills than at the office of Canada's leading e-commerce company? The 12-hour hackathon will be filled with food, fun, prizes, and speakers!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=80 Spadina Ave, Toronto, ON M5V 2J4, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Does it work?
Is it working effectively?
Does it carry out its purpose?

How pretty is it?
How easy is it to use?
Is it modern?

Is the idea original?
Does it solve a problem?

Is the hack viable? 
Would you use it?

Overall impression of hack and pitch?
Did the presenters keep you engaged?
Any visuals or demos?

Does   it   encompass   all   types   of   users? Does   it   cohere   with   the   guidelines
stated   in   the   Shopify   Usability presentation?

hackathon-location-address: 80 Spadina Ave, Toronto, ON M5V 2J4, Canada
hackathon-description-header: 12 hours of hacking at Canada's largest startup
